Overview

The project was a solution to URL Shortener challenge. It was a good challenge to solidify my external API usage, responsive layout, and React skills.

The challenge

The challenge was to integrate with the shrtcode API to create shortened URLs and display them like in the designs. User stories that needed to be fulfilled:

  • -View the optimal layout for the site depending on their device's screen size
  • -Shorten any valid URL
  • -See a list of their shortened links, even after refreshing the browser
  • -Copy the shortened link to their clipboard in a single click
  • -Receive an error message when the form is submitted if The input field is empty
